title: English and Dutch colonization in the new world
brief_description: Reconstructs the beginnings of settlement in an English agricultural colony in Virginia, a Dutch trading colony in New York, and a Pilgrim colony in Massachusetts, and explains some of the basic motivations and patterns of colonisation.
title_for_label: English and Dutch colonization in the new world
